column4: does anybdody knows where do I extract this file to fix emesene conection problem? https://github.com/emesene/emesene/zipball/master
and none of them is an executable
with lots of directorys in it...
it's a python installer for windows, so it won't run on Linux
There's aPPA to install emesene under Ubuntu: http://blog.emesene.org/p/downloads.html
If you want to install emesene on your system use the PPA repository. Then you can install it with aptitude install emesene
okay and it has a problem with connecting? How do you want sove this problem? Got a hint from somwhere?
just that file... but it does not say where extract or how run it
Which file? To build from the sources you need to enter: python setup.py install
if you extract the package cd into it, then you run python setup.py build. You'll have the binaries under ./build
just to be clear, this is the command: "python setup.py build" ... and than ./build?
the command executed in the emesene directory is python setup.py build. Afterwards there wil be a dir called build where the builded files are found
I still don't really know what you want to do?
That is clear but how do you want to solve this problem? Install from the sources?
MAybe it's a good solution to sort out what the connection problem is?
